body:
- Various E-commerce, property management and data migration projects. Contributing to established code bases, resolving issues and took ownership of misaligned code bases to improve toward stability.
- Frontend and backend projects, React, NestJS, ExpressJS, Wordpress.
- Lead and developed an end-to-end Fullstack / Unity based Edutainment (education + entertainment) mobile game to teach
- Arabic language to kids, with a full backend service and frontend dashboard to track child's progress and implemented external in app purchase flow, saving 30% from Googles and Apples IAP commission.
